Class.name: ClassExplorer.ClassView
Class.Description: Cache Class Explorer vX.X.X/*build.replace:pkg.version*/ Class contains methods that return structured classes/packages data.

Method.name: getAllNamespacesList
Method.Implementation: set resp = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set resp.namespaces = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set resp.currentNamespace = $NAMESPACE set result = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%SYS.Namespace:List") do result.Execute() while (result.Next()) { set ns = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set ns.remote = result.Get("Remote") set ns.status = result.Get("Status") do resp.namespaces.%DispatchSetProperty(result.Get("Nsp"), ns) } return resp

Method.name: getClassTree
Method.Description: Returns structured class tree with all classes available in current namespace

Method.name: fillClassData
getMethod
inPackage
Method.Implementation: quit $FIND(packageName, basePackageName) - $LENGTH(basePackageName) = 1

Method.name: extendClassFromType
Method.Description: Wrap registered types to class names
Method.Implementation: return $CASE(typeName, "%Boolean": "%Library.Boolean", "%String": "%Library.String", "%Integer": "%Library.Integer", "%DataType": "%Library.DataType", "%Status": "%Library.Status", "%CacheString": "%Library.CacheString", "%Persistent": "%Library.Persistent", :typeName)

Method.name: correctInheritance
collectInheritance
Method.Description: Fill inheritance data Returns new (correct) super

Method.name: getBaseOData
Method.Implementation:
set oData = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set oData.basePackageName = packageName set oData.restrictPackage = 1 // expand classes only in base package set oData.classes = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
set ns = $namespace zn baseNamespace if $get(^ClassExplorer("savedView", ns_":"_savedName)) '= "" { set oData.savedView = $get(^ClassExplorer("savedView", ns_":"_savedName)) } zn ns
quit oData

Method.name: classExists
Method.Description: Returns if class with given name exists.
Method.Implementation: quit ##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%OpenId(className) '= ""

Method.name: getClassView
Method.Implementation: set baseNamespace = $namespace zn:$GET(namespace)'="" namespace set package = $LISTTOSTRING($LIST($LISTFROMSTRING(className, "."), 1, *-1), ".") set oData = ..getBaseOData(package, baseNamespace, "CLASS:"_className) do ..fillClassData(oData, className, level) quit oData

Method.name: getPackageView

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/" Method="GET" Call="Index"/> <Route Url="/index" Method="GET" Call="Index"/> <Route Url="/css/CacheClassExplorer.css" Method="GET" Call="GetCss"/> <Route Url="/js/CacheClassExplorer.js" Method="GET" Call="GetJs"/> <Route Url="/Test" Method="GET" Call="Test"/> <Route Url="/GetClassTree" Method="GET" Call="GetClassTree"/> <Route Url="/GetClassView" Method="GET" Call="GetClassView"/> <Route Url="/GetAllNamespacesList" Method="GET" Call="GetAllNamespacesList"/> <Route Url="/GetPackageView" Method="GET" Call="GetPackageView"/> <Route Url="/GetMethod" Method="GET" Call="GetMethod"/> <Route Url="/SaveView" Method="POST" Call="SaveView"/> <Route Url="/ResetView" Method="GET" Call="ResetView"/> </Routes>

Method.name: GetClassTree
Method.Description: Method returns whole class tree visible in the current namespace.
Method.Implementation: do ##class(ClassExplorer.ClassView).getClassTree(%request.Get("namespace")).%ToJSON(, "o") return $$$OK

Method.name: GetClassView
Method.Description: Returns classTree by given class name
Method.Implementation: set className = %request.Get("name") set classData = ##class(ClassView).getClassView(className, %request.Get("namespace"), %request.Get("level")) do classData.%ToJSON(, "o") return $$$OK

Method.name: SaveView
Method.Implementation: set name = %request.Get("name") set content = %request.Content.Read($$$MaxStringLength) // ~ 7mb set ^ClassExplorer("savedView", name) = content write "{""OK"":true}" return $$$OK

Method.name: ResetView
Method.Implementation: set name = %request.Get("name") kill ^ClassExplorer("savedView", name) write "{""OK"":true}" return $$$OK

Method.name: GetPackageView
Method.Description: Returns all package class trees by given package name
Method.Implementation: set packageName = %request.Get("name") set classData = ##class(ClassView).getPackageView(packageName, %request.Get("namespace")) do classData.%ToJSON(, "o") return $$$OK

Method.name: GetAllNamespacesList
Method.Description: Return the list of all namespaces
Method.Implementation: do ##class(ClassExplorer.ClassView).getAllNamespacesList().%ToJSON(, "o") return $$$OK

Method.name: GetMethod
Method.Implementation: set className = %request.Get("className") set methodName = %request.Get("methodName") set methodData = ##class(ClassView).getMethod(className, methodName, %request.Get("namespace")) do methodData.%ToJSON(, "o") return $$$OK

Method.name: GetCss
GetJs
Index
Http304
Method.Implementation: Set %response.Status="304 Not Modified" Quit $$$OK

Class.name: ClassExplorer.StaticContent
Class.Description: Cache Class Explorer vX.X.X/*build.replace:pkg.version*/ static content generator. Class contains methods that return JS/CSS/HTML data for single page application.

Method.name: Write
Method.Description: Write the contents of xData tag
Method.Implementation: Set xdata = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId("ClassExplorer.StaticContent||"_Const).Data set status=##class(%XML.TextReader).ParseStream(xdata, .textreader) while textreader.Read() { if (textreader.NodeType="chars") { w textreader.Value } } return $$$OK

Method.name: CreateProjection
Method.Description: This method is invoked when a class is compiled.

Method.name: RemoveProjection
Method.Description: This method is invoked when a class is 'uncompiled'.
Method.Implementation: set ns = $NAMESPACE zn:ns'="%SYS" "%SYS" if (##class(Security.Applications).Exists("/ClassExplorer")) { w !, "Deleting WEB application ""/ClassExplorer""..." do ##class(Security.Applications).Delete("/ClassExplorer") w !, "WEB application ""/ClassExplorer"" was successfully removed." } zn:ns'="%SYS" ns QUIT $$$OK
